snippet: Ms. Walters has been the queen of the TV celebrity “get.” But stars and politicians no longer need the networks to reach their public.
abstract: Barbara Walters, 84-year-old queen of the television celebrity 'big get,' is retiring after five decades in television; she turned the celebrity interview into a kind of art form, but ratings have plunged in crowded environment with stars and politicians turning to social media, and no longer needing networks, to reach their public.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Walters has been the queen of the TV celebrity “get.” But stars and politicians no longer need the networks to reach their public.

headline.main: As Barbara Walters Retires, the Big TV Interview Signs Off, Too
headline.print_headline: As Barbara Walters Retires, the Big TV Interview Signs Off, Too
